response.job_title: Director and Co-founder en Hostal Villa San Juan
response.summary: Chemical Engineer that has aquired a vast experience in the tourism sector, education and development of new projects. Getting to understand how to create a tourism destination, with sustainability as the most important task to fulfill. Developing a new chemical company based on green chemistry, with the aim of getting high value products that allow to pay the natural raw materials to rural communities at fair prices.
response.skills: SAP, Microsoft Office, Aspen HYSYS, Industria petroquímica, Ingeniería química, Materiales de construcción, Programación neurolingüística, Relaciones con los empleados, Comunicaciones empresariales, Operaciones de planta, Control de calidad, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description: Our aim is to promote sustainable tourism through innovation and social inclusion. Introduction of sustainable tourism as a viable economic alternative for the local population. Working over a model known as rural community-based tourism. Our biggest attractiveness is the nature surrounding us. Promoting long-term tourism as the best way to get to know the local costumes. Start-up Company. Family business.
profile_positions.title: Director and Co-founder

profile_positions.description: Tutoring inorganic chemistry and basic organic chemistry to students in the United States and Canada, from high school to college.
profile_positions.title: Chemistry Tutor - Advanced Tutor

company.name: Marco Quijano Rico Ph.D., E.U. - Vineyard and Cellar Marqués de Puntalarga

profile_positions.company: Marco Quijano Rico Ph.D., E.U. - Vineyard and Cellar Marqués de Puntalarga
profile_positions.description: High altitude tropical viticulture. First producer of high quality wine in Colombia, varieties Riesling and Pinot Noir. Study over the effect of a new disease, recently discovered in Colombia, very similar to Esca disease. Design of a process to produce healthy plants, to achieve the scaling up of the Vineyard from a pilot project to an stablished industry.
profile_positions.title: Associate Researcher

profile_positions.description: Research assistant. "Glycerol with methanol over solid acid catalysts reaction evaluation". PhD thesis of Luis Ignacio Rodriguez. PhD in Chemical Engineering. Heterogeneous Catalysis - Biofuels. Reactions under supercritical conditions.
profile_positions.title: PhD Assistant

company.name: COMPAÑIA ELECTRICA DE SOCHAGOTA S.A. E.S.P - TERMOPAIPA IV

profile_positions.company: COMPAÑIA ELECTRICA DE SOCHAGOTA S.A. E.S.P - TERMOPAIPA IV
profile_positions.description: Planteamiento de una propuesta para el tratamiento de los vertimientos de aguas termominerales con alto contenido de sulfatos, sobre la cuenca alta del río Chicamocha. Proyecto presentado a Corpoboyacá bajo el marco de Responsabilidad Social Corporativa. El objetivo era disminuir el contenido salino del río chicamocha, con el fin de aumentar la productividad de los cultivos que se alimentan de sus aguas.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de Proyectos

profile_positions.description:
* Brindar soporte a áreas de producción y comercial
* Aceptar y liberar producto terminado y materias primas.
* Manejo de inventario en la herramienta SAP. 
* Actualización de documentos para certificación ISO 9001
* Análisis Físico - Químico a materia prima
* Pruebas a nuevas formulaciones
* Análisis de nuevas materias primas
profile_positions.title: Quality Control Intern
